title: Diamond Vanki Style Pendant
features: Contemporary Vanki-inspired design. Features a delicate graduated arrangement of diamonds in a pave setting, creating a shimmering effect. The curved design is modern and elegant. Perfect to add to any chain.
description: Offers a modern take on a classic South Indian design. The Vanki design signifies prosperity and good luck, making it an auspicious and stylish piece. Excellent diamond quality ensures brilliance and lasting value. The rose gold adds a touch of warmth and sophistication.
